comment: I have inspected the scaffolding and confirmed several loose connections. We need replacement parts before anyone can access it.
I have contacted the testing lab. They will be on site tomorrow to take samples for analysis. Area has been cordoned off.
Thank you for the quick response. Please keep us updated on the lab results as soon as they arrive.
Warning signs have been placed and the area has been treated with anti-slip solution. Safe to use now.
Good job on the quick fix. Please make sure the maintenance team is notified to use proper procedures in the future.
All materials have been cleared from the exit pathway. Exit is now fully accessible.
Confirmed compliance with fire code. This issue is now resolved.
I have begun reorganizing the chemicals according to the compatibility chart. Expect completion by tomorrow.
Temporary solution: cords have been secured and covered with cord protectors. Working with facilities to install permanent outlets next week.
Thanks for the update. Please ensure the permanent solution is implemented as scheduled.
